message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this excellent product. Given its value, I'm proposing a price of $1,100,000.  I believe this is a fair offer considering the significant benefits it will bring to your business.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your proposal, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the price of $1,100,000. I am willing to offer $950,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I understand your budget constraints, the value this product brings is substantial. I can come down slightly to $1,050,000. This is my final offer.

I've reviewed your latest offer, Alice. While I'm appreciative of the reduction, I still need to stay within my budget. I would like to propose a price of $1,000,000 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle for us.
